inn1.comm: Irfan gets really good bounce and carry first up, Dilshan watches it rise up
not as much bounce this time but a very good line, the ball curves in before reaching Dhoni
gets this one to come back in again and he's cramped for room as he tries to cut
this one shapes away after pitching. a touch too wide in fact as he shoulders arms
clips it away with a flick of the wrists and Jayasuriya pushes the single, Dilshan hesitates initially
lands on a good length on the off stump and he defends down the track
strays on the pads and he clips it away with the movement down to fine leg
gets his bat  nicely behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
gets this one to skid through and dart back in on the pads, the ball lobs to the off side
gets nice inward movement after pitching, he gets his pad across and shoulders arms
132 kph, fires it in on a good length outside the off stump and the ball really kicks up before reaching the keeper
loses his line and strays really wide down the leg side
and the wide costs the over five runs, Ishant grants him enough width to free his arms, he gets his front pad across and crashes a overpitched ball past the gap between cover and mid-off
swings it away late and he gets across and clips it across the line to midwicket
lands it on the off stump line and he defends it back
gets a bit of late away movement and Jayasuriya covers that by walking across his stumps to pat it back
gets a bit more bounce this time and he gets across again and taps it towards point
Irfan fires that on the pads and he shuffles across a touch and deftly clips it down to fine leg
really tucks him with a sharp incutter and Dilshan gets a thick inside edge on to his pads
comes over the wicket, he lands it on a good length outside off and watches the ball shape away from him
that extra bounce cuts like a knife, the ball goes through the gap between bat and body
gives him a bit too much width outside off and he slams that hard through the gap between square cover and point
taps it towards cover and immediately tells his partner to head back
full in length and shaping away from the off stump, he shoulders arms
leans on to the straight drive a little too early and as a result he nearly inside edges onto the stumps, fine leg picks it up
gives him the charge to slam it over mid-off but he fails to pull it off and luckily the ball just falls short of Yuvraj in the same position
clips it on the up to deep square leg and Ishant does really well to sprint from fine leg and pull it back before the rope
that's vintage Jayasuriya, Irfan pitches it up on the off stump and he delicately flicks it across the line and the ball sails over square leg
angles it down the leg side and he nicely works it away down to fine leg with the movement, he only shuffles at his crease slightly
lands it on a good length outside off, he cuts to backward point
lands it on middle and off, he gets across his stumps and taps it back to the bowler
gets a bit of a loopy bounce before reaching the keeper
strays really wide down the leg side, too wide for Dilshan to chase it
lovely delivery, squares him up just outside the off stump, Dilshan prods forward and pokes his bat out
shapes to drive straight but he gets an inside edge to the off side
Ishant overpitches and Jayasuriya makes him pay, he leans forward and scoops him high over mid-off
squares him up a bit on middle and off and he taps it back to the bowler
lands it on a good length on off and he steers to the off side
a touch slower, fullish outside off, and Dilshan is early into the shot and can't time properly
what a run, this one was swinging in, and was played straight to mid-off, but Gambhir had to come in and an early call from Jayasuriya enables the single
and Jadeja drops it... short ball, hit straight to him at point, he went fingers facing up, and the ball went in and came out. Jadeja is usually considered to be a very good fielder at domestic level
on the pads and guided away for an easy single
short and wide, and Dilshan goes for an aerial cut, and misses completely
fuller, on the stumps, and played towards midwicket, won't get any runs for it
see you later, short on the pads, and Jayasuriya goes for the typical short-arm pull, bounces just inside the square-leg boundary
and he sends it back to square-leg boundary again, short again, and another short-arm pull, and the result is the same
and this is is short and wide, and Jayasuriya wants to whack it, but doesn't connect properly, all safe though
this is classy stuff, another short ball, and Jayasuriya waits an extra half second, rolls his wrists on the pull, and hits backward of the deep square-leg fieldsman
and he will take a quick single now, angling in towards off stump, and Jayasuriya just taps it towards mid-off and off he goes for the run
he's bowling well to the right-hand batsman, just outside off, holding its line, and Dilshan lets it go
gets his bat down on angle to cut but he ends up tapping it to cover point
cramps him for a bit of room to cut but he ends up slicing it wide of backward point
terrible ball and well dealt with by Dilshan, he bowls it really wide of the off stump and takes a lot of pace off the ball, that allows Dilshan to front foot slap past the covers
holds the length back but he gives the batsman too much width, he bends his knee slightly and plays a forceful square drive past point
angles it across the right hander and he safely shoulders arms
that's a terrific comeback after those two boundaries, he gets one to jag away from Dilshan and nearly gets him to edge it to Dhoni
nearly traps Jayasuriya with his very first delivery on his international comeback, he angles it across him first, slices him in half as the ball moves the other way sharply and beats Dhoni as well
really wide outside the off stump and Jayasuriya reaches out and gets a top edge which lands safe in front of third man
continues over the wicket, pitches it outside the legstump and hits him high on the pad, there's a half-hearted appeal
runs in smoothly, Jayasuriya clips it away to midwicket
he pulls on the front foot to deep square leg and Jayasuriya sets off for the second run but Dilsan sends him back
loses his line and strays wide down the leg side
that's a poor delivery, too wide of the off stump, he reaches out and takes the risk of playing an aerial shot with a packed off side field waiting to snap him up, he just manages to find the gap
that's a poor shot, he steps down the track and Irfan digs it short on seeing him advance, Jayasuriya gets a top edge and Raina takes it at mid-off, very tame dismissal that
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
very well timed, Irfan gives him width and bowls it on a good length, he reaches out only slightly and places it well between the gap between cover and point
reaches out to cut and hits it on the up past backward point
gets it come back in late and Dilshan softly taps it down to cover
lands it on a good length on off and middle, he defends to the off side
keeps it on the stumps, he stays at the crease and softly taps it to cover
pitches it up on the off stump and he nearly chips it on the up to extra cover
strays on the pads and he clips it behind square on the on side
poor shot, he makes just a bit of room to play a flashy square cut but Balaji beats him with extra pace and bounce
good length on the off stump, he reaches out and cuts to third man
mistimes the drive to mid-on
drifts really wide of the offstump, lucky not to be called though, Dilshan didn't offer a shot
chance for him to whip it away off his pads but he fails to get any wood on it
full on the off stump and Dilshan pushes it aaway very firmly past the bowler, even the fielder at mid-off wasn't quick enough to get to his right and cut it off
outside off and Dilshan swings and misses
gets behind the line and defends to the off side
gets behind the line to a full delivery and defends
continues over the wicket, lands it on a good length on middle and off, he turns the face of the bat and clips it to the on side
flashes hard outside off and the ball bounces in front of Jadeja at backward point
bowls the slower legcutter and Dilshan taps it to the off side
another slower legcutter, he taps it in front of cover and sets off
gets behind the line and defends to the off stump
he errs by straying on the pads, Sangakkara shuffles and clips it wide of midwicket and square leg
pitches on middle and leg, he works it to the on side
tries to flick it away fine but the ball clips his glove and rolls to the on side
gets this one to kick up off a good length, he hops and mistimes the cut to cover
kicks up again off a good length, he hops and punches it to sweeper cover
lands it on a good length outside off and he lets it go
gets behind the line to a good length ball and he defends
lands it on the offstump, he cuts to the off side
angles it down the leg side, he fails to glance it away
slower through the air, he gets forward and taps it in front of mid-off and sets off
backs away from the stumps to glide it down to short third man
gets forward and pushes it in front of cover
flighted down the leg side, Sangakkara gets in position for the sweep early and places it well wide of short fine-leg
flighted on middle and leg, he clips it in front of mid-on and sets off
angles it down the leg side, he clips it for a couple
makes room and cuts to the off side
slower through the air, he cuts to the off side
slower through the air, he defends to the off side
this one turns and bounces, he cuts to the off side
Sehwag pushes that wide of the leg stump, he gets on his knee and sweeps wide of short fine-leg
gets forward and works it against the turn to deep square leg
gets forward and defends
stays on the backfoot and punches it down to long-on
shuffles, waits for the turn and clips it down to midwicket
taps it to cover point
pushes it back to the bowler
makes room and punches it wide of point
he stays on the backfoot and cuts to the sweeper on the off side
shapes to play the late cut but he misses
was that a drop? There may have been two sounds, don't know if he edged it to Dhoni,  anyway the ball deflects off Dhoni to fine leg
makes room and pushes it to mid-off
Sehwag bowls his mandatory loosener down the leg side and Sangakkara sweeps, Rohit runs from short fine leg, dives in vain and knocks down the poor ball boy
makes room and cut to the off side
eases it away to sweeper cover
shuffles and glances it to deep square leg
waits for the turn and clips it to fine leg
gets well forward and pushes it wide of cover
shapes to drive straight but mistimes it to the on side
gets a bit of width and he drives wide of cover
makes room and cuts square, the batsmen nearly collide while taking the second run
full on the off stump and he drives to mid-off
beats him on the front foot with a jaffa outside the off stump
makes a bit of room, waits for the turn and cuts to sweeper cover, he pushes hard for the second run
gets to the pitch of the ball and pushes it with the turn to mid-on
steers it towards backward point
stays back at the crease, waits for it to come on to him before punching it down to cover
full outside off, he drives to the off side
shuffles and clips it away down to fine leg
quick through the air but wide of the off stump
drives away from the body and he ends up chopping it down the pitch
punches it to Ishant at sweeper cover and he puts pressure on the fielder, excellent running
this time he punches it straight to Ishant who charges at the ball
pushes it with the turn to the off side
clips it away to short midwicket
makes room and cuts towards point
he errs by angling it on middle and leg and Sangakkara decides early enough to sweep, it really should have been cut off by Gambhir at fine leg who tries to boot it away
floated on middle and leg, he defends
pushes it back to the bowler
flighted on off, he drives down to cover
slaps it wide of cover and there's a misfield
poor ball, it's too short and wide outside off, he makes room and cuts wide of short third man
really gets across his stumps this time, gets on his knee and scoops it behind the wicketkeeper
pushes it with the turn to mid-on
flighted on the pads, he clips it away to short fine leg and it's a fifty for Sangakkara, apologies if I failed to mention Dilshan's fifty earlier
nudged to the on side
stays on the back foot and cuts wide of cover point
he's on the front foot and gets a leading edge wide of short extra cover
he overpitches outside the off stump, Dilshan gets behind the line and bangs it wide of mid-off and cover
shuffles and works it to the on side
clips it to short midwicket
steps down the track and pushes it to the off side very close to the pads, seemed like it came off the pad
gets on the backfoot and punches it to cover
flighted on middle and off, he gets on his knee and slogs him with intent over midwicket, that was one clean hit
gets forward and drives through the line to sweeper cover
places it to sweeper cover and that's the 100 stand
makes room and slaps it to the off side
take that, he flights it on off and middle, Sangakkara gets on his knee and slogs it cleanly, this is even better compared to the earlier shot, almost went for a six
tries to slog him again but he plays it along the turf towards deep square leg
very slow through the air, he makes room and cuts to the off side
gets forward and pushes it through the line to long-off
gets forward and taps it softly to the off side
tries to work it to the on side but the ball rolls off his pads
steers it in front of point with an angled bat and sets off
gets well forward and pushes it back to the bowler
gets forward and steers it to cover point
mid-off does well to slide to his right and save a single
makes room and cuts him wide of sweeper cover
gets forward and chops it back to the bowler

Yuvraj bowls it short and Sanga slaps it back hard down the pitch, Yuvraj tries to get around it he misfields, Rohit does well to slide from long-on to deflect it and Gambhir picks up the ball just inches before the rope
gets on his knee and sweeps to fine leg
makes room and cuts to deep point
gets forward and pushes it wide of cover
drives straight to cover
finds the gap on the off side and places it to deep point
drives hard towards mid-off and Raina deflects the ball to the fielder on the off side
pushed to mid-off
misfield, Dilshan gets some room outside the off stump and he gets a short ball as well, Yusuf falls to his left but fails to get a hand to it
defended to the off side
goes back and pushes it to sweeper cover
taps it softly to the off side and sets off
makes room and tries to crash it square but he finds point
comes round the wicket and flights it on middle and leg, he gets on his knee and plays the paddle scoop to fine leg
pushed through the line to the on side
drifts wide down the leg side
shuffles and clips it against the turn to the on side
clips it behind square on the on side and that's the 200 up, the last fifty has come off 47 balls
drives on the front foot to mid-off
makes room and cuts behind square on the off side
flighted on off and middle, he drives to mid-off
gets forward and pushes it past the bowler
gives it a lot of air on middle and leg, he gets on his knee, gets nicely under the ball  and slogs him just over the deep midwicket rope
defended to the on side

Sangakkara attempts another slog over the on side but he fails to get under this one, this one is slower through the air and Sangakkara slogs a little too early, Rohit runs from long-off and takes the catch sliding forward
gets off the mark with a push to mid-on
stays back and works it back to the bowler
stays back at the crease and nudges him to the on side
makes room and cuts past point
gets on his knee early and nudges a quicker delivery wide of midwicket
stays back and clips it to square leg
works it with the spin to deep square-leg
stays back, waits for the turn and cuts to sweeper cover
defended back to the bowler
defended back to the bowler
gets a bit of width this time and cuts
tucked off the pads to square leg
mush quicker through the air and defended on the front foot
makes room and cuts to sweeper cover
fires it across the left-hander from round the wicket, Kandamby angles it to short third man
clips it away to square leg and Yusuf does well in the field
gets forward and chips it towards cover point
short outside off and cut past backward point
round the wicket, short and wide, and Kandamby rocks back and cuts it to the point boundary
overpitched on the pads, and helped away to wide of long-on
short, turning in, Dilshan goes back on the back foot but realises he doesn't have enough room, and guides it into covers
angled into pads, helped towards left of Raina at midwicket, no run after a yes and no
on the pads again, and played towards long-on for an easy single
angling into the pads of the right-hander this time, Dilshan turns his wrists over it, but can't find the gap
and he starts with a slower ball, played back to the bowler
angling across, Kandamby looks to cut but plays over it and can't get power into it
overpitched delivery, on the stumps, and played towards long-on for an easy single
just short of a length, played straight to point with an open face, and Kandamby was a goner if the throw would have hit
back of a length, on the stumps, and whipped away towards square leg
just short of a length, on the off stump, and played towards sweeper cover with an open face
Raina returns, Dilshan taps it back to the bowler
shuffles and nudges to the on side
taps it in front of mid-off and cover and sets off
fires it from round the wicket and Kandamby defends
tries to dab it away very close to the body but misses
Balaji gives him width outside off, Kandamby bends his knee slightly and square drives it past backward point
gets forward and defends to point
that's a very clean hit, Kandamby picks the slower ball early, the ball is delivered from round the wicket, he gets on his knee and picks the spot between long-on and deep midwicket
opens the face of the bat and glides it down to third man
swing and a miss, it;s outside the off stump and  Dilshan realises how close that was to an edge
grants him width outside the offstump, he reaches out and slashes it just wide of Ishant at sweeper cover
makes room and cuts to the off side
cuts wide of deep point and he goes to 96
gets well forward and defends
shapes to cut but he places it straight to point
pushes it through the line to long-off and he walks the single
comes round the wicket, he gets to the pitch of the ball and drives to the on side
Ishant starts off his new spell with a wide down the leg side
cramps him for a bit of room outside off and he ends up chopping it to point

comes over the wicket, Ishant lands it bang on middle and the ball straightens, Kandamby's beaten for pace and the ball clips the top of middle stump, not sure if Kandamby actually picked it off the pitch as he was totally squared up

that's a double strike and Dilshan misses a well-deserved century, Jayawardene softly taps it towards Rohit at cover point and there's confusion about the single, Dilshan turns back but there's a direct hit by Rohit and he's way short of his ground
defended to the off side
gets forward and pushes it through the line past the bowler
India are hitting back here, Ishant lands it on the corridor outside off and tempts Kapugedera in to poking at it, there's a thin edge to Dhoni and Kapugedera walks back for a first-ball duck
another one bites the dust, Yuvraj flights it on the off stump ever so slowly, Jayawardene tamely chips it towards Raina at short cover who dives and takes the catch
rocks back and punches to deep point
drives through the line to long-off
very slow off the pitch, he rocks back and cuts to deep point
gets forward and defends to the off side
stays on the backfoot and steers it towards point and takes a quick single, the fielder tries to under arm the ball onto the stumps
gets to the pitch of the ball and defends towards mid-off
lands outside off and he drives past extra cover for an easy two
stays at his crease and punches it back down the track
excellent timing by Maharoof, it was overpitched outside the off stump by Ishant, Maharoof gets behind the line and gets his placement spot on, he finds the gap at the deep extra cover fence
goes for a wild slog and misses
comes round the wicket, he slaps it to deep cover and takes a single
taps it in front of point and sets off for a quick single
bowls it short and he hits it hard down to extra cover
much slower through the air, it's looped on middle and leg, he has enough time to get on his knee and sweep it over square leg
lands it on a full length on middle and leg, he pushes it through the line to long-on
big swing and a miss and the ball nearly shaves the off stump
gives him width but he mistimes the off drive completely and he finds mid-off, picks up a single though
pitches it up on middle and leg and he clips him high over midwicket, it falls well short of the fielder though

Ishant bowls the slower ball, Thushara stands outside his crease but fails to get under the low full toss properly and ends up chipping it tamely back to the bowler, there was no reaction at all from Ishant after taking the catch, it wouldn't have occured to most people that it was actually a catch
pushed off the pads to the off side
comes over the wicket and angles it across the right-hander, he tries to glide it away but misses
lands it on middle and leg, he nudges it to the on side
he errs by sliding down the leg side and Maharoof stays at the crease and deftly glances it down to fine leg, wrong line to bowl
full on middle and off and pushed to long-off
gets forward to a full ball and taps it to mid-off
and again, he gets forward and takes a single to long-off
bowls the slower ball, he checks his shot and glides it down to point
lands it on a good length on middle and off and comes back in, he gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
swings at a short delivery, the ball lobs off his shoulder and just beats short fine leg
poor ball, it's a over-pitched gift outside the offstump, Kulasekara gets forward and scoops it over extra cover
Ishant makes it even easier for Kulasekara by drifting down the leg side, the ball clips off the pad and rolls away for four down to fine leg
angles it on the pads, he clips it wide of square leg
swing and a miss, Maharoof's trying to break free against the slower balls
gives him  the charge and Irfan bowls the slower ball, Maharoof only connects with thin air
that's three consecutive dot balls, Maharoof swings but the ball rolls off his pads
Maharoof breaks the drought by stepping out and swinging a full delivery over mid-on, a couple of bounces and four
Dropped But a superb attempt by Gambhir, maharoof lofts over mid-on, Gambhir runs back, dives and fails to hang on to it but he has backup for the throw
bowls a length ball on middle and leg and Maharoof has another free swing of the arms and connects even better, this time he clears cow corned comfortably
full on middle and leg and pushed to midwicket
length ball, he mows it to midwicket and Raina runs across and pulls it back just before the rope

he goes for an across the line swipe and mistimes it to deep square leg, Jadeja is very impressive as he runs across and fires the throw to Dhoni who whips off the bails, the third umpire takes a look
bowls the slower ball outside off, he softly taps it down to cover
Kulasekara is trapped by another slow leg cutter, he tries to scoop it over extra cover but fails to make contact
a nasty beamer goes screeching towards Murali's face and Ishant can;t stop apologising, they shake hands mid-pitch, I tell that was scary, luckily Murali evaded it early enough
bowls a fuller one on the stumps and he digs it out to the deep on the off side

inn2.comm: Sangakkara stands up to the stumps straight away, Gambhir pushes a full ball straight to mid-on
just gives him a bit of width and he places it wide of backward point
Sehwag gets off the mark with a deft glide to third man, the ball skids through quickly
pushed  towards cover
waits for it to come through before tapping it away wide of cover
he gets his bat down on an angle to meet the ball before steering it to third man
bangs on target on the off stump and Sehwag does well to defend it away
goes for a really wild slash, the invitation was there for the shot and he nearly edged it
Thushara errs by giving  him width and Sehwag hits that so hard over cover that the ball travels like a tracer bullet

poor shot by Sehwag after banging him for four the previous ball, Thushara pitches it a little fuller, he shapes to clear mid-off but the ball travels off the splice of the bat to Jayasuriya who runs to his left and cups it over his head
Raina goes for a firm slash and Jayawardene sets an excellent example diving to his right at short point
gets across and behind the line to push it back to the bowler
Gambhir plays a very airy drive off the front foot and just places it wide of short third man

Kulasekara strikes and the Sri Lankans deserve credit for setting it up, Raina prods forward to a delivery which shapes away, he gets a fairly thick edge and Sangakkara, who's up to the stumps, takes it easily, the plan was to put Raina under pressure with the keeper up to the stumps and it has paid off
safely lets this one go
gets nicely behind the line and taps it away
shuffles and clips it away down to midwicket
the ball skids onto his pads before rolling to the on side and there's an appeal, that was missing leg
walks down the pitch and Gambhir checks his shot and glides it towards point
lands it on a good length on middle and leg, he clips it to the on side
adjusts to a shorter length, Yuvraj is solid in his backward defense
awesome timing, Thushara bowls a length ball and Yuvraj picks it from the off stump and stylishly flicks it high over square leg, effortless stuff
full in length outside off and patted back to the bowler
cramps him up for room and Yuvraj is forced to come forward to defend a skiddy delivery
lands on a good length on off and he defends
elegance! Kulasekara pitches it up on the pads and the ball straightens, Yuvraj drives through the line off the 'V' and caresses it past mid-on
drives straight to mid-off
angles it towards middle and leg and he pushes it back down the pitch
comes back in to the left hander and he defends again
pushes it away to the off side very close to the pads and Sanga appeals for a lbw, Yuvraj is struggling to make his ground but the throw's wide
lands on a full length on off and he pushes it across the line to mid-on
opens the face of the bat and tries to steer it square but he finds backward point
tries to pierce the covers but he finds the fielder again
Yuvraj checks his shot and gets a leading edge, the ball is in the air for a few anxious moments before dropping short of Thushara at mid-off
very streaky! Gambhir gets forward and tries to play a late cut at a delivery shaping away from him and luckily first slip was a little wide, he found the gap alright
clipped to the on side
an attempted slower yorker turns in to a low full toss and Yuvraj merely pushes it through the line off the meat of the bat and beats midwicket and mid-on
gets right behind the line and defends
pitched up and in the slot to loft, Yuvraj stays at the crease and goes over the top but doesn't quite time it properly, it's a four nevertheless
keeps it straight and he plays it back to the bowler
keeps it full and straight this time and he defends back to the bowler
Gambhir goes back to his old tactic of stepping down the pitch and he makes use of the width well by slamming him past the packed off side field, he gets a four to deep cover
shuffles and works him to the on side
pulls hard along the ground and Jayasuriya does well at short midwicket to cut it off
classic timing again, Yuvraj is in sublijme touch, it was fractionally short, he picked the length early and cleared midwicket with an effortless swing of the arms
he steps down the track this time and punishes a full delivery on the leg stump, he clears wide mid-on this time
Yuvraj's not done yet, Maharoof pitches it a litte short and Yuvraj goes for the pull again, this time it's much squarer than the previous boundary
clips it back down the track
and the setup has trapped Gambhir as well, Sangakkara is up to the stumps as usual, Gambhir stands a little outside leg stump to give himself room to swing him over the top but he gets a thin edge
gets behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
gets forward this time and drives to mid-off
lands outside off and he pushes it to cover
risky shot but he survives, he half heartedly drives on the up and the fielder at short cover dives to his right and attempts to pull off a blinder in one motion
Thushara returns, bang on target straight away and Yuvraj gets across and defends
brilliance from Yuvraj again, it's full and straight, Yuvraj takes a couple of paces down the track and effortlessly lofts him over mid-on, good use of the wrists too
drives elegantly but places it to mid-off
stays on the backfoot to a delivery which keeps a little low and he steers it to the off side
full and in the slot to drive, he pushes it to mid-off
fetches the ball from the off stump and tries to work it past midwicket
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
bowls it fuller and lures him into the drive, he places it to mid-off
swings it on the pads and he clips it away down to midwicket
Kulasekara bangs it in short, that sits up nicely for Rohit to pull him over midwicket, the ball almost kicks up in line with his helmet
angles it on his pads and he whips it on the up past midwicket
gets forward and pushes the ball back to the bowler
the ball holds its line outside the offstump and he steers it away towards backward point
bangs it in short, he pulls and the ball dips in front of deep square -leg
pitches on middle and leg and he clips it to square leg
he gives him width Rohit cuts hard but finds backward point
comes round the wicket and angles it towards the pads, he works it away to midwicket
lands it on middle and leg, he clips it towards mid-on
very stylishly chipped to the vacant mid-on region, the fielder is pushed back
Dropped tough one for Kandamby at short midwicket as he dives to his right to intercept a short-arm pull, the ball just about carries to his fingers
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
drops it a little short and he pulls it past short midwicket
gets on the backfoot and pushes it to point
drops it on a good length and gets it to straighten, he gets behind the line and defends
strays wide down the leg side and Sanga appeals thinking Yuvraj edged it while trying to pull
clips it down to deep midwicket and Mendis fumbles and pulls the ball back
fires in the yorker outside off and he fails to dig it out

Yuvraj at his best again, it was short and heading towards the body, he swivels and checks his shot as he pulls but the timing was exquisite, so was the placement as he beat short fine leg and deep square leg
pushes it in front of cover and sets off
steers it down to third man
bowls the slower ball and Rohit gets an edge to the keeper which falls short of the keeper
pulls just wide of the diving short midwicket fielder and Kapugedera does well to sprint from sweeper cover to cut it off
bowls a very low full toss and Yuvraj makes room and carves it wide of backward point
gets back and taps it down to third man
goes on the backfoot and flicks it to square leg
Rohit goes for broke and pays the price, it wasn't short enough to pull but Rohit goes ahead with the shot and gets a thick top edge to Kulasekara at mid-on
bangs in the bouncer outside off and he lets it go
gets to his fifty in style with another wonderful on side flick, he gets under a pitched up delivery and swings him over midwicket
fires it full and he digs it out to the off side
tucks it to the on side and sets off for the single, they push the second
walks down the pitch and drives it softly towards mid-off
there's a thin inside edge onto his pads but Thushara reckons it hit the pad first and appeals
this man's in sublime touch, Maharoof bowls a slower ball on the pads, he sweeps him like he would do for a spinner
chips down the track and lofts over the region of mid-on, the ball travelled so quickly to long-on that the momentum nearly pushed him back
gets on the backfoot and works it wide of cover
god length on middle and he clips it down to square leg
clips it down to square leg
goes for a wild slash and nearly drags the ball back on to his stumps
takes on Murali immediately as he slaps  a short delivery down to the region of  long-on, it was short of the fielder
the sharp turn nearly squares him up, luckily he manages to get behind the line
wider outside off, he pushes it to the off side
gets a leading edge to the off side
gets turn again and he pushes it to the off side against the turn
tries to sweep and Sanga appeals confidently thinking Yuvraj edged it, umpire Tyron Wijewardene shakes his head
pushed through the off side
that's the shot of the day! I wonder what Yuvraj had for lunch, he treats Maharoof like a spinner  by slogging him effortlessly over deep midwicket
steps down the track and lofts him down to long-on
defends to the off side
continues over the wicket, doesn't turn much but the ball clips his backleg and Murali appeals
he gets to the pitch of the ball and drives straight and Murali gets a hand to it, he injures his finger in the process
opens the face of the bat and steers it to the off side
shuffles and clips it down to fine leg, Dhoni pushes for the third run
gets well forward and drives towards mid-off
works him to the onside
goes on the backfoot and pushes it to deep cover
lunges forward to defend
lunges forward to defend
shows the full face of the bat and defends
Murali gets the danger man! He delivers from over the wicket and Yuvraj gets on his knee too early for the slog, he gets a tame top edge and Murali runs to his left and takes the skier
pushes it to the off side
strays down the leg side
gets forward and defends a full delivery
commits to the front foot and defends the doosra well
quicker through the air and defends the delivery safely
skids through straight and he defends
makes room and cuts a skiddy delivery down to sweeper cover
delivers on the pads and he clips it wide of square leg
Dhoni decides to give him the charge and a length delivery is deposited some five rows back over deep midwicket
full on the off stump and he defends to the covers
strays on the pads and he clips it away to the on side
comes round the wicket, he defends
clips it with the turn to the on side
drives firmly back to the bowler
very audacious shot, Murali fires it down the leg side and Dhoni plays a backdrive past the keeper, the sort of shot you see only in gully cricket
gets forward and pushes it wide of cover
defends back to the bowler
Mendis still gets no turn, Pathan taps it square of the wicket on the off side
beats him outside the off stump this time
gets right behind the line and defends
opens the face of the bat and steers it to point
steers it towards gully
shapes to cut but mistimes it to cover

Murali comes from round the wicket and lands it on a full length on off and middle, Yusuf gets forward to defend but the ball clips him low on the pad, the umpire doesn't take too long to give that out
gets off the mark in international cricket with a drive to long-off
shuffles and clips him to the on side
gets nicely behind the line and defends
he safely shoulders arms this time
lands on a length on middle and leg, he defends
keeps a little low but he defends
gets forward and drives to the off side
stays back and chops it down to cover
full on off and driven wide of cover
comes over the wicket and angles just across the left hander, pitches outside leg and hits the pad, there's an appeal
strays wide down the leg side and it beats the keeper
strays wide down the leg side again
the off break and the leading edge rolls back to the bowler
full on the pads, played to fine leg, quick single, and a wild throw from Jayawardene gives them an extra run
full on the off stump, and defended
overpitched just outside off, and played to long-off
an easy single to long-on
overpitched, on the stumps, driven straight to left of long-on, and a quick couple is taken. good running
pitched within stumps, and helped for an easy single towards long-on
angled into the pads, and turned away towards square leg
regulation off break and defended off the front foot
another offbreak, and defended with an open face
offbreak again, and Jadeja can't find a gap through the covers
tries the carrom ball, but is misdirected down the leg
flighted outside off, and defended watchfully
flatter, on the pads, and turned away towards midwicket
overpitched, Dhoni steps out, almost yorks himself but gets a single to mid-off
into the pads, full, and an easy single to long-on
flighted outside off, easy single to long-off
angling away towards off, and Jadeja plays towards point
over the wicket now, can't find the gap in the leg side off this delivery angled in to him
another one helped along the angle, and this time it goes to write of short leg and a single ensues
short and wide, he cuts to sweeper cover
stays back and pushes it back to the bowler
this one comes on quick and he chops it wide of the bowler
big shout for lbw, pitches in line and straightens, the huge stride forward may have saved him, Hawkeye reckons that would have hit, umpire Jerling shakes his head
lands on a good length outside off and he cuts it away wide of backward point
taps it to the on side
he beats him on the cut, good straight delivery
lunges forward and pushes it to the off side
gets forward and taps it to the off side
chips down the track, checks his stroke and gets a leading edge to the off side
gets down the track and drives to long-off
flighted on middle and leg, he chips down the track and works it to the on side
makes a bit of room and slaps him down to sweeper cover
flighted on middle and leg, he works it down to long-on
turns it to the on side and takes a single
comes on straight, he makes room and cuts to cover point
clips it towards short midwicket and sets off but he's sent back, Sanga whips off the bails, appeals for a run out and the third umpire finds him safe
slides down the leg side and he sweeps
gets forward and drives to sweeper cover
pushes it flatter and quicker, he shuffles and clips it to the on side
gets down the track and pushes it through the line to long-off
paddles a delivery down the leg side and finds short fine leg
gets a bit of width outside off and he cuts to the off side
shuffles at the crease and whips it to the on side
nudges him away to the on side
turns it to the on side and just ambled to the other end, luckily for him the throw is wide
he gets to his fifty in emphatic style, he steps down the track and goes downtown, the ball travels about 10n rows back over long-on
lands outside off and spins away, he makes room and cuts
gets on his knee and sweeps
lunges forward and defends
steps down and pushes him through the line to mid-on
plays away from the body and steers him to short third man
Dhoni tries to take Jayasuriya downtown but he fails to get the elevation, he gives him he charge and lands it down Kulasekara's throat at long-on
gets well forward and defends
waits for it to turn before clipping to the on side
defends to the on side
flighted on middle and leg, he defends to the on side
defended back to the bowler
waits on it before clipping him across the line
makes room and cuts to the off side
strays down the leg side
defends softly and the ball nearly rolls on to the stumps
whips it away to Kapugedera to midwicket
gets on his knee and sweeps to deep square leg
gets on his knee and slogs him high in the air to fine leg
steps down the track and pats it back to the bowler
stays back at the crease and pulls just wide of short midwicket
chips down the track and takes the aerial route, the ball falls safe of deep midwicket
good shot, he fires it outside off, he makes room and slashes hard and safe of short third man
gets across and pats it back to the bowler
gets across his stumps and pats it back to the bowler
lands outside leg and clips his pads and rolls to the on side
cramps him for room to cut and he chops it back down the pitch
picks the doosra well and steers him to the off side
gets forward and clips him to the on side
flighted on middle and off, he gets well forward and defends
comes on straight, Irfan gets his bat behind the line and pushes it to long-on
strays on the pads and h clips it to deep square leg
full on the off stump and pushed to long-off
tucks it to midwicket
full on the offstump and driven to sweeper cover
stays at the crease and clips it to the on side
lands outside off, he makes room and cuts to the off side
gets down to sweep him really early and the ball strikes him high on  the pads, Murali appeals
clips him to the on side
tries to sweep him again and he makes contact with thin air
full outside the off stump and driven to sweeper cover
turns the face of the bat and clips it to midwicket
skids it on the pads, he clips it down to fine leg
goes for a huge slog and gets an inside edge on to his pads
makes room and mistimes the cut to the off side
Irfan makes room, Mendis bowls it short, Irfan tries to carve it over the infield on the off side, Kapugedera pedals backwards from cover point and takes the catch
bowls a full one on the stumps and he drives
gets well forward and defends
full on the off stump and he drives hard off the front foot, mid-off dives and cuts it off
lands outside off and comes back in and clips him on the pads outside the line of the leg stump
full on the off stump and driven to the covers
slides on the pads and he works it wide of midwicket
makes room and digs out a yorker wide of point and Jadeja just makes his ground
pushed to the off side
full on the off stump and drives firmly to long-on
gets well forward and defends
strays on the pads and he clips it away wide of short fine leg
first slip is wide and Balaji edges it right through the gap between keeper and slip
makes room and pushes it down to mid-off
makes room and scoops him over cover point
makes room to smash it through the off side but he gets an inside edge to the on side
it's a low full toss outside the off stump and he makes room and pushes it wide of backward point, he's on 46
bangs it in short and he lets go of the bouncer
that's a fifty on debut! Kulasekara overpitches on the off stump and Jadeja makes room and crashes it past the bowler and mid-off, he's the 11th Indian to score a fifty on debut
drives on the up just wide of mid-off
swings and misses, he tries to hit him against the turn
swings across the line again and the ball rolls to the keeper
nice shot, he stays at the crease, waits for the ball to come on to him and lofts him through the line to long-on
clips it to short midwicket for a single
and Kulasekara takes his fourth catch, Balaji chips down the track and tries to launch him over long-on but only just fails to clear the rope, Kulasekara takes it easily
gets forward, the ball lobs off the pads and rolls on the pitch
waits for the turn, makes room and cuts
comes round the wicket, he steps down the track and lofts him down to long-on
shuffles and clips him to the on side
reads the doosra and steers him with the turn to the off side
flighted on the pads, he shuffles and clips him to the on side
chips down and drives on the up to long-off
makes room and carves a slower delivery down to point
stays back at the crease and clips him to long-on
strays wide down the leg side
the slower ball lands on a yorker length outside off, he doesn't dig it out
full on the off stump and pushed towards mid-off
Maharoof hits the leg stump and it's all over, Ishant makes room and goes for a huge heave ho over the on side but misses it completely
